free.question: Is LINE free to use?
free.answer: Yes, LINE's basic features (chat, voice calls, video calls, etc.) are completely free to use. Some paid stickers and in-game purchases may incur additional charges.

data.question: How much data does it consume?
data.answer: Text messages are very lightweight. Voice calls consume about 0.3MB per minute, and video calls consume about 5MB per minute. We recommend using Wi-Fi when possible.

multidevice.question: Can I use the same account on multiple devices?
multidevice.answer: Smartphone version allows only one device per account, but PC and iPad versions can be used simultaneously. Messages are synchronized across all devices.

delete.question: How do I delete my account?
delete.answer: Go to Settings > Account > Delete Account to proceed. Please note that all data will be permanently deleted and cannot be restored.

footer.description: Official and secure LINE app download site. Compatible with all platforms.
